description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
descriptionRaw:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 10 rounds.
flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
name: Buried Sun Disc

description:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
descriptionRaw:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
flavorText: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen
name: Restored Sun Disc

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 2 rounds.
flavorText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker
name: Esteemed Hierophant

description: I have 3 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: I have 3 random keywords.
flavorText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.
name: Exalted Poro

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
name: Devoted Council

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
name: Golden Ambassador

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
descriptionRaw: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
name: Ascended's Rise

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link>When I block or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator

description: Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Ruthless Predator

flavorText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.
name: Bloodthirsty Marauder

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
name: Exhaust

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
name: Quicksand

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
name: Unworthy

description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton
name: Dominus Destruction

description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Cataclysm

description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
name: King Jarvan III

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
name: Gallant Rider

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
name: Golden Aegis

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard
name: Tattered Banner

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
name: Ancient Preparations

flavorText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.
name: Clockling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
name: Aspiring Chronomancer

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
name: Khahiri the Student

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
name: Khahiri the Returned

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. It is The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
name: Preservarium

description: Grant an allied landmark "My <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> completion effect activates twice".
descriptionRaw: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
flavorText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean
name: Promising Future

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
name: Taliyah

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
flavorText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.
name: Taliyah

description:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving

description: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Stoneweaving

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Sai Scout

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Hibernating Rockbear

flavorText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary
name: Grumpy Rockbear

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Desert Naturalist

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the Strongest ally +2|+2.
flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
name: Salt Spire

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
flavorText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.
name: Roiling Sands

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an ally and summon a Stasis Statue in its place.
flavorText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher
name: Ancient Hourglass

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 1: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
flavorText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers
name: Stasis Statue

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah
name: Threaded Volley

description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Teen Spirit
